b2.name: &c☠ &eRevenant Horror
b2.lore:
&7Abhorrent Zombie stuck
&7between life and death for
&7an eternity.

&eClick to view boss!

b3.name: ☠ Tarantula Broodfather
b3.lore:
&7Monstrous Spider who poisons
&7and devours its victims.

&cSlay Revenant Horror II!

b4.name: ☠ Sven Packmaster
b4.lore:
&7Rabid Wolf genetically
&7modified by a famous mad
&7scientist. Eats bones and
&7flesh.

&cSlay Tarantula Broodfather II!

b5.name: ☠ Voidgloom Seraph
b5.lore:
&7If Necron is the right-hand
&7of the Wither King, this
&7dark demigod is the
&7left-hand.

&cSlay Sven Packmaster IV!

b6.name: ☠ Riftstalker Bloodfiend
b6.lore:
&7A half-vampire, half-thrall,
&7immortal golem creation
&7representing the multiverse
&7coven in combat.

&cOnly inside The Rift!

b7.name: ☠ Inferno Demonlord
b7.lore:
&7Even demons fear this
&7incarnation of pure evil,
&7constantly feeding on its
&7burning desire for
&7destruction.

&cSlay Voidgloom Seraph III!

d2.name: Auto-Slayer
d2.lore:
&7Upon defeating a boss,
&7&aautomatically &7completes the
&7quest and starts another of the
&7same type if you have enough
&7&6coins &7in your purse or bank.

d3.name: Slayer Leaderboards
d3.lore:
&8Ultimate bragging rights

&7Revenant Horror: &8N/A
&7Tarantula Broodfather: &8N/A
&7Sven Packmaster: &8N/A
&7Voidgloom Seraph: &8N/A
&7Riftstalker Bloodfiend: &8N/A
&7Inferno Demonlord: &8N/A

d6.name: &aGlobal Combat Wisdom &7Buff
d6.lore:
&8Slayer Bonus

&7Total buff: &3+0☯ Combat Wisdom

&7Earn extra Combat XP based on
&7your unique slayer boss kills.

&8Highest slain tiers
&7Revenant Horror: &8No kills
&7Tarantula Broodfather: &8No kills
&7Sven Packmaster: &8No kills
&7Voidgloom Seraph: &8No kills
&7Riftstalker Bloodfiend: &8No kills
&7Inferno Demonlord: &8No kills

&7Tier I, II, III grant &3+1☯ Combat Wisdom&7.
&7Tier IV grants &3+2☯ Combat Wisdom&7.

d7.name: Slayer Bonus Rewards
d7.lore:
&7&7Unlock bonuses by reaching a
&7LVL on the first 3 bosses.

&c✖ LVL 6
&7Earn &a+3 &7of any boss's main
&7token drop when slaying its
&7mini-bosses.

&c✖ LVL 7
&7Slayers are &64% cheaper&7.

d9.name: RNG Meter
d9.lore:
&7Your &dRNG Meter &7fills with
&dSlayer XP &7every time you
&7 defeat a &aTier III&7 or higher!

&7When your meter is full, your
&7selected drop will be guaranteed
&7to drop the next time you defeat
&7the boss!
